00050 typedef struct NearestPhotons
00051 {
00052         long unsigned m_max;
00053         long unsigned m_found;
00054         long unsigned m_gotHeap;
00055         Point3D m_pos;
00056         double* m_dist2;
00057         Photon** m_index;
00058 }NearestPhotons;
00059 
00060 class PhotonMap
00061 {
00062 public:
00063                 PhotonMap( long unsigned maxPhotons );
00064                 ~PhotonMap();
00065                 
00066                 void savePhotonMap( const char *filename ); 
00067                 void loadPhotonMap(char *filename);
00068                 
00069                 void locatePhotons( NearestPhotons* const np, const long unsigned index ) const;
00070                 double fluxAtPoint( const Point3D& point, int maxClosest ) const;
00071                 void store( Photon* photon );
00072                 void balance();
00073                 long unsigned StoredPhotons() const { return m_storedPhotons; };
00074                 Photon* GetPhoton( int index ) const;
00075 
00076 private:
00077                 void balanceSegment( Photon*** pbal, Photon*** porg, const long unsigned index, const long unsigned start, const long unsigned end );
00078                 void medianSplit( Photon*** p, const long unsigned start, const long unsigned end, const long unsigned median, const long unsigned axis );
00079 
00080                 Photon** m_photons;
00081                 
00082                 long unsigned m_storedPhotons;
00083                 long unsigned m_halfStoredPhotons;
00084                 long unsigned m_maxPhotons;
00085                 long unsigned m_prevScale;
00086                 long unsigned m_axis;
00087                 BBox m_bbox;
00088 };
